text: Kim Kardashian and Kylie Jenner stepped out together on Monday in Calabasas, California, and the sighting made me do a legit double - take. They both sported monochromatic grey outfits that looked tight, but aerodynamic as hell, and made the two moms look like straight - up TWINS.
